subtitleNullable: Cropped images of traffic sign dataset
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Traffic Sign Recognition


### Content

Following dataset contains the cropped images of original dataset b [GTSRB](https://benchmark.ini.rub.de/gtsrb_news.html). Original data contains images in `ppm` format. But after cropping I changed it to `jpg` format. There are a total of over 27000 training Images and 12630 testing images.

- `crop_dataset` contains training data divided into folder wise.
- `test_data` contains images for testing.
- `test_labels.csv` file contains true labels of test_data 

### Usage

This data can be a used for Multi class classification. It is very useful for beginners who are starting with Deep Learning, especially computer vision.
Refer to this [notebook](https://www.kaggle.com/shanmukh05/traffic-sign-recognition?rvi=1) if you are learning tensorflow. 

### Acknowledgements

http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.neunet.2012.02.016
title: Traffic Sign Recognition Cropped Images
